code: @Override public Producer createProducer() throws Exception {     if (SagaEndpointAction.COMPLETE.equals(this.action)) {         return new SagaProducer(this, true).     } else if (SagaEndpointAction.COMPENSATE.equals(this.action)) {         return new SagaProducer(this, false).     } else {         throw new IllegalStateException("Unsupported action '" + this.action + "' in saga endpoint").     } }
@Override public Consumer createConsumer(Processor processor) throws Exception {     throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Consumer not allowed for saga endpoint"). }
